description: Formats the response as a bulleted list, making information easier to scan and digest. This decorator is ideal for presenting sequential steps, key points, or collections of related items in a clean, concise format.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The visual marker used for bullet points

parameters.name: indented
parameters.description: Whether to allow nested, indented bullet points

parameters.name: compact
parameters.description: Whether to keep bullet points short and concise (true) or allow longer, more detailed points (false)

examples.description: Basic bulleted list of key points
examples.usage:
+++Bullet
What are the main factors to consider when buying a laptop?
examples.result: Presents key laptop purchasing factors as a bulleted list with dash markers

examples.description: Compact star bullets with nesting disabled
examples.usage:
+++Bullet(style=star, indented=false, compact=true)
List the benefits of regular exercise.
examples.result: Provides a flat list of concise, star-bulleted points about exercise benefits, with no nested sub-points
